about_the_game:
“CreepyLand Tileset Pack Plus” is the second collection of the “CreepyLand Tileset” series!
This tileset is suitable for creating outdoor and indoor scenes of a cute and creepy world where demons live their days at ease.
Some of the tileset also include animated character chip version.

*******************************************
■Contents
●Tiles: 7 sheets (Original: 2 sheets / Variation: 5 sheets)
　　　　Inside_B
　 Outside_B
●Characters: 19 files (including color variations)
●SV_weapon: 1 sheet
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
